**Text Title:** *The Supreme Orthodox Unity Register-Inspection Rite*
Compiled by Du Guangting, the Master of Broad Accomplishment, in the late Tang dynasty—a revised version of an early Celestial Master register-inspection rite. One fascicle.

**Source:** *Daoist Canon of the Zhengtong Era*, Dongshen Department, Ritual Propriety Section.

### **The Supreme Orthodox Unity Register-Inspection Rite**
Compiled by Du Guangting, the Master of Broad Accomplishment

For all who receive the Orthodox Unity registers, the rites shall be performed on days of *jiazi*, *gengshen*, one’s life-destiny day, the Three Origins, the Three Assemblies, the Five La Festivals, the Eight Nodal Days, and the last and first days of the lunar month. On these days, the celestial *qi* announces renewal, the radiance of Yang dispels darkness, all virtues are made new, the heavenly spirits descend in full, the earthly spirits emerge in full, the water spirits arrive in full, the Great Unity takes its seat, and the seed-people are selected. Their merits and transgressions are examined, life and death are determined, and names are inscribed in the Golden Towers.

On such days, Daoists and seed-people must purify themselves, enter the oratory in fasting, and at the hours of *mao* and *you*, burn incense and prepare twenty-four portions of wine and fruit—or sixteen, twelve, or eight portions—ensuring all is solemn and immaculate. First, the register is unfurled upon the table. Donning fresh, cool garments and having bathed and rinsed, they then enter the chamber to offer incense and focus their intent, following each step precisely without omission.

The order of rites is as follows:
First, recite the **Entrance Incantation**;
Next, offer incense at the **Cave Table**;
Then, offer incense at the **Primary Table**;
Next, recite the **Incense Incantation**;
Then, bow to the master and meditate as prescribed;
Next, strike the **Ritual Drum** twenty-four times;
Then, recite the **Furnace-Opening Incantation**:

*"Supreme Mystery-Origin, Five Numinous Venerable Lord, summon now the Merit-Officials and Messengers, the Left and Right Dragon-Tiger Lords, the Incense-Bearing Messengers of the Three Qi Orthodox Spirits—hasten to report and transmit! To the Three Heavens’ Supreme Mystery-Origin Dao Lord, your servant now enters the oratory to burn incense. On this assembly day—the Upper Assembly on the seventh day of the first month, the Middle Assembly on the seventh day of the seventh month, the Lower Assembly on the fifth day of the tenth month—faithfully following the Celestial Master’s canonical rites, I inspect the Orthodox Unity Alliance-Awe Precious Register bestowed upon my person. May the life-*qi* of the Eight Directions’ Orthodox Perfected descend and flow into my body. May this petition swiftly ascend before the Supreme Perfected, Boundless Great Dao, the Jade Emperor, and the August Emperor of the Most High."*

Bow thrice after each recitation.

Next, declare the ritual rank:
*"From the Great Mystery Capital, Orthodox Unity, Level-*Qi* System, Celestial Master of [X] Treatment, [X]-Qi Red Heaven’s Three-Five Step-Net Destiny Perfected, your servant [Name], humbly petitions the Most High Pure Mystery-Origin, Boundless Three Heavens’ Supreme Great Dao: the Supreme Dao Lord, the Supreme Venerable Lord, the Supreme Elder, the Heavenly Emperor Lord, the Heavenly Emperor Elder, the Nine Elders of the Immortal Capital, the Nine-*Qi* Elder, the myriad layers of Dao-*qi*, the Twelve Hundred Official Lords, and the August Presence beneath the Jade Terrace of the Great Clarity.*

*Though unworthy and foolish, I have received the profound transformation of the Great Dao. As the Dao bestowed its methods and the Orthodox Unity flourished, I was graced by my revered master with the transmission of the secret registers—*Extending Life, Transcendent Flight, Three-Five Grade Scriptures*—to inwardly rectify body and mind, harmonize and pacify spirit and *qi*, and outwardly ward off calamities, suppress misfortunes, and repel pernicious influences. May the superior immortals and numinous marshals, the generals, officials, and merit-officers within the precious registers, each according to their office, protect my body and life, regulate the Six Palaces, calm the Hundred Passes, ensuring that malevolence and misfortune do not intrude, the Three Corpses fall away, the Nine Worms perish, the Nine Ancestors and Seven Generations ascend to heaven and attain the Dao, deliver all beings, broadly aid heaven and humanity, assist the state in its time, establish merit for all things. On each assembly day, may my merits be reported and my rank advanced. I vow to uphold these practices eternally, never betraying my oath of devotion. Humbly beseeching the Great Saints of the Three Heavens and the Venerable Hosts to regard my sincerity and ever grant me grace and forgiveness."*

Bow repeatedly in reverence.

Next, summon the officials:
*"Humbly summon from within your servant’s body:
The **Superior Immortals and Numinous Lords**, the **Northern First Supreme Unity General**, the **Ten Generals of the Supreme Unity**, the **One Hundred Fifty Generals of the Superior Immortals**, the **Direct Merit-Officials**, the **Orthodox Unity Merit-Officials**, and the **Healing Merit-Officials**, fifteen each, to emerge and serve as your servant’s executive marshals, overseeing the regulation of *qi* in the east, west, south, and north, dispelling the Hundred Diseases;
The **Superior Immortals and Numinous Left and Right Official Messengers**, the **Marshals of the Four Directions**, to repel the Three Calamities, Nine Perils, Five Punishments, and Six Harms;
The **Chief Scribes and Soldiers**, leading the left and right, ensuring no errors in sequence;
The **Superior Immortal Numinous Yin-Yang Divine Judgment Officials**, fifteen each, to emerge and harmonize your servant’s yin and yang, determine the register of life, pacify spirit and nurture nature, aligning with the Perfected Immortals;
The **Superior Immortal Numinous Yin-Yang Healing Merit-Officials**, the **Yin-Yang Healing Heavenly Physician Scribes**, fifteen each, to emerge and regulate your servant’s yin and yang, examine the Five Viscera’s spirits, and administer the immortals’ wondrous medicines to dispel illness and misfortune;
The **One Hundred Fifty Generals of the Two Offices of the Superior Immortals and Numinous Lords**, to lead the marshals, officials, scribes, and soldiers in encircling your servant’s body thrice, leaving no gaps;
The **Superior Immortal Numinous Gentleman Scribes**, the **Tiger-Rushing Detectives**, the **Hook-Riding Cavalry**, the **Three Officials’ Archery Scribes**, one thousand two hundred each, to emerge and garrison your servant’s dwelling, guarding left and right, following east, west, south, and north within a hundred paces, their weapons outward to hunt and capture rebels and malefactors, executing them utterly without escape, ever protecting your servant’s body;
The **Superior Immortal Numinous Heavenly Couriers**, the **Armored Soldiers**, one thousand two hundred each, and the **Heavenly Might Warriors**, one hundred twenty each, to emerge and follow your servant in all directions, responding to every summons with haste;
The **Superior Immortal Numinous *Qi*-Gathering, *Qi*-Consuming Scribes**, the **Spirit-Gathering, Spirit-Consuming Scribes**, the **Ghost-Gathering, Ghost-Consuming Scribes**, the **Malevolence-Gathering, Malevolence-Consuming Scribes**, the **Toxin-Gathering, Toxin-Consuming Scribes**, sixty each, to emerge and gather and consume the world’s toxic epidemics, demonic *qi*, malevolent spirits, and pernicious gods, as well as *shanghan* fevers, malarial miasmas, venomous infestations, pestilential evils, and vicious beasts—all to be gathered, consumed, and utterly dispersed."*

The **Superior Immortal Numinous Vermilion Talisman Scribes of the Chariot Division**, the **Stalwart Wind Couriers**, and the **Swift Steeds for Memorials to the Throne**, ten each, to emerge and serve your servant in capturing and seizing treacherous and malevolent spirits, thieving demons, and unrighteous *qi*, presenting memorials and petitions to swiftly transmit them upward.

Next, in accordance with their ranks, emerge the **Officers and Soldiers from the Registers**:
Reverently emerge the **Register of the Supreme Orthodox Unity First General**, with its **Attendant Generals, Envoys, Officers, Soldiers, and Jade Maidens**, to assist your servant in aiding the state and propagating transformation, exterminating the fierce and wicked, that the Supreme Dao may flourish and expand.

Reverently emerge the **Register of the Supreme Orthodox Unity Right Superior Numinous Summons of the Hundred Ghosts**, with its **Attendant Generals for Body Protection, Jade Lads, and Jade Maidens**, to serve your servant in capturing and beheading the *chimei* and *wangliang* within the body and throughout the world, that they may cause no harm to people.
Reverently emerge the **Supreme Orthodox Unity Primordial Chaos Original Destiny Vermilion Register**, with its **Jade Lads and Jade Maidens of the Three Heavens for Dispelling Filth, Officers and Soldiers of the Five Directions’ Dragon Kings**, to serve your servant in annihilating the ghosts of blood sacrifices and wandering specters that assail people, utterly sweeping all away.

Reverently emerge the **Supreme Orthodox Unity Register of the Divine Talismans for Dispelling the Six Harms**, with its **Lord of the Great One, Lord Sovereign of August Heaven, Supreme Primordial Lord, Spirits for Dispelling the Six Harms, Generals for Eliminating Punishments and Annihilating Harms, and Attendant Officers**, to serve your servant in driving away portents and omens, dissolving and removing disasters and harms, that the thousand spirits and ten thousand ghosts may all be subdued and vanquished.
Reverently emerge the **Supreme Orthodox Unity Register of the Nine Phoenixes for Breaking Filth**, with its **Heavenly Numinous Vermilion Officials, Generals for Beheading Malevolence, Seizing Malevolence, Breaking Malevolence, Attacking Malevolence, Striking Malevolence, Intercepting Malevolence, Advancing against Malevolence, and Annihilating Malevolence, the *Qinqi* General, Envoys, Jade Lads, and Jade Maidens**, to serve your servant in cleansing and sweeping away the gods not listed in the registers, ensuring their complete eradication.
Reverently emerge the **Supreme Orthodox Unity Register of the Capital Memorials and Completed Seals**, with its **Heavenly Numinous Officials, Attendant Officers, Generals, Immortals, Daoists, Jade Maidens, and Envoys**, to serve your servant in beheading and extinguishing the ten thousand malevolent disasters and calamities, that they may not assail people.
Reverently emerge the **Supreme Orthodox Unity Register of the Great Canopy**, with its **Attendant Officers of All Divisions, Generals, Officers, Soldiers, Jade Lads, Jade Maidens, and Five Cloud Soldiers**, to serve your servant in executing and beheading the rebellious and wicked, annihilating the treacherous and deceitful.

Reverently emerge the **Supreme Orthodox Unity Register of the Great Beheading of River Malevolence**, with its **Fifty Commanding Generals, Hu, Yue, Di, Qiang, and Cang Generals of the Elder Lord’s Tiger Warriors, Generals for Launching Heaven and Shaking Earth, Generals for Shaking Heaven and Moving Earth, Five-Colored Five-Canopy Soldiers and Horses, the Supreme Mysterious Elder General, Officers, Soldiers, Envoys, Jade Lads, and Jade Maidens**, to serve your servant in brandishing flying daggers and wheeling blades, searching out and scouring demonic spirits, that the encampments and dwellings may all be secure and stable.
Reverently emerge the **Supreme Orthodox Unity Register of the Three and Five Attendant Officers**, with its **Soldiers and Horses for Concealing the Body, Hiding the Form, and Concealing the Self**, to serve your servant in internally guarding the Three Palaces and externally governing the Three Realms, that all celestial gods, earthly deities, and Dao-corrupting demonic forces may be utterly swept away, responding instantly to focused thought.

Reverently emerge the **Supreme Orthodox Unity Register for Preserving Life and Prolonging Existence**, with its **Left and Right Marshals of the Principal Network and all Departments’ Attendant Officers, Generals, Officers, Soldiers, and Envoys**, to serve your servant in internally governing the Five Viscera and externally repelling all demonic forces, that the Three Corpses may be annihilated, the Hundred Passes harmonized and unobstructed, merits perfected and deeds fulfilled, and ascension to Heaven in broad daylight achieved, humbly bearing the mysterious grace.

Next emerge the **Generals and Soldiers of the Various Departments**:
Reverently emerge the **Supreme Orthodox Unity Register of the Various Departments’ Mysterious Elders and Five Marquises, Great Generals of Five Hundred Thousand**.
Emerge the **Supreme Mysterious Elder General**, the **Circumpolar Great General**, the **Canopy Heaven Great General**, the **Establishing Heaven Great General**, the **Central Yue Great General**, the **Central Martial Great General**, the **Central Charioteer Great General**, and the **Central Pavilion Great General**, each with one hundred thousand soldiers.

Emerge the **Eastern Hu Elder Lord’s Reverse-Armor Reverse-Scale Soldiers of Nine Hundred Thousand**, the **Southern Yue Elder Lord’s Fire Encampment Cavalry Officers and Fire-Torch Soldiers of One Hundred Thousand**, the **Western Di Elder Lord’s Smelting-Staff Metal Essence Soldiers of Six Hundred Thousand**, the **Northern Qiang Elder Lord’s Bian Que Wuyuan Soldiers of Five Hundred Thousand**, and the **Central Three Qin Cang Elder Lord’s Twenty-Five Myriad Official Lords and Soldiers of One Million Two Hundred Thousand**.

Reverently emerge the **Heavenly Illustrious Red Officials, Direct-Affairs Merit-Recorders**, the **Spirit-Registers Spirit-Capital Protectors, Prison-Capturing Great Clerks**, the **Evil-Capturing Envoys**, and the **Spirit-Direct-Tally Evil-Slaying Treachery-Stabbing Clerks**, each numbering two, along with one hundred twenty **Immortal Persons, Daoist Masters, and Jade Maidens**, the **Seven Body-Guarding Spirits**, fourteen **Unseparating-Body Generals and Clerks**, two **Illness-Treating Merit-Recorders and Body-Guarding Generals**, nine **Military-Affairs Clerks**, two **Bian Que Clerks and Heavenly Physicians**, all to execute authority, slay evil and destroy falsehood, repel death and invite life, assisting your servant’s body, ensuring responsive breath. Your servant, having received the registers of the Upper Immortals and Supreme Spirits, along with their subordinate generals, merit-recorders, envoys, true officials, lords, generals, jade lads, jade maidens, soldiers, clerks, and troops, beseeches them to act according to their respective duties, transmit commands and convey truth, propagate the essentials of the Dao, establish merit to aid the state, practice transformation to save people, instruct the deluded and ignorant, and encourage the good and virtuous. Should any subordinate officials harbor malevolent qi or rebellious intent, or if there be ominous officials, slanderous tongues, or evil persons plotting to harm your servant, may the left and right officials and envoys immediately report to the Heavenly Offices without concealment. From year’s end to year’s end, from month’s end to month’s end, from day’s end to day’s end, from hour’s end to hour’s end, cycling without cease, may they act in accordance with the method, defending and protecting your servant’s body, delivering from calamities and hardships, ensuring longevity and enduring vision, with the heart-spirit settled and stable. Wherever your servant goes, may truth be embraced, and in all travels and destinations, may metal and stone open, water and fire assist. Beneath the covering of august heaven, upon the bearing of august earth, within the illumination of sun and moon, through the passage of mountains and rivers, may the hundred evils be subdued, the myriad spirits obey, the hundred passages flow with moisture, the five viscera generate fluids, true qi descend upon the body, refining form and transforming substance. When merit is accomplished and virtue complete, may your servant ascend to heaven in broad daylight, timely reporting merits without betraying trust.

Your servant, a late and shallow learner, further burdened by foolishness and dimness, having perused the generals, clerks, soldiers, officials, generals, and troops, fears they may not conform to ritual propriety or align in proper order, accumulating a thousand transgressions and ten thousand errors. Humbly beseeches pardon and forgiveness, extending to those yet to awaken, that no punishment be meted. Your servant, with utmost reverence and trepidation, bows twice in prostration.

Upon completion, swallow qi three times.

Next, knock the teeth three times in succession, then kneel lengthily and pray:
Your servant has concluded the register’s perusal. May the transcendent immortals, celestial spirits, functionaries, envoys, generals, clerks, and soldiers just summoned all return into your servant’s body, entering through the Gate of Myriad Mysteries, resuming their respective positions—those on the left returning to the left, those on the right to the right—resting securely in the golden hall and jade chamber. Let the functionaries and envoys take charge of their oversight, ensuring no disorder in the protective encirclement, that it may enfold and envelop without breach, boundless as heaven and earth. When summoned again, may they arrive as before, in accordance with precedent.

Next, address the incense burner:
Incense officials and envoys, Lords of the Left and Right Dragon-Tiger, attendant spirit-officials of incense, may this place where your servant peruses the register in quietude naturally generate golden fluid, cinnabar, azure mushrooms, and the assembled host of a hundred numinous perfected, all converging here before the incense burner. May what is here proclaimed ascend directly to the presence of the Most High Jade Emperor, the August Thearch.

Bow three times.

Next, chant the *Hymn to the Study of Immortality*.

Next, exit the chamber and recite the spell:
The rite of the Orthodox Unity register-perusal is now complete.

chunks.original_text: 洞神部威仪类 太上正一阅箓仪 经名：太上正一阅箓仪。 唐末杜光庭编集，系早期天师道阅箓仪改编本。 一卷。 底本出处：《正统道藏》洞神部威仪类。 太上正一阅箓仪 广成先生杜光庭集 凡受正一法箓，常以甲子、庚申、本命、三元、三会、五腊、八节、晦朔等日。 是日乃天气告生，阳明消暗，万善惟新，天神尽下，地神尽出，水神悉到，太一在位，搜选种民，考算功过，掇死定生，列名金阙。 道士及种民其日须清斋入靖，以卯酉时焚香，排办酒果二十四分，或一十六分，或一十二分，或八分，务令严洁。 先展舒法箓於几案之上，着新冷衣服，澡浴盥漱毕，然后入户上香存注，一一如法，不可阙也。 先持入户咒， 次上洞案香， 次上本案香， 次上香咒， 次礼师存念如法， 次鸣法鼓二十四通， 次发炉咒， 太上玄元五灵老君，当召功曹使者，左右龙虎君捧香使者三炁正神，急上关启 三天太上玄元道君，臣今正尔入靖烧香，以某会之日，正月七日上会，七月七日中会，十月五日下会谨依天师具典，简阅臣身中所佩正一盟威宝箓，愿得八方正真生炁降流臣某身中，所启速达径御太上至真无极大道玉皇尊帝御前。 各三礼。 次各称法位 泰玄都正一平炁系天师某治某炁赤天三五步纲元命真人臣某，谨上启 太清玄元无上三天无极大道太上道君、太上老君、太上丈人，天帝君、天帝丈人，九老仙都君、九炁丈人，百千万重道炁、千二百官君、太清玉陛下。 臣以凡愚，获奉玄化，大道垂法，正一兴行，叨荷师尊，授传秘箓延生飞化三五品文，内正身心，和宁神炁，外棱灾珍禳制氛邪，上仙上灵魁呈宝诀箓中将吏功曹众官，各有职司，保身护命，调平六府，澄静百关，使妖恶不侵，灾害不扰，三尸堕落，九虫销亡，九祖七玄，生天证道，开度群品，广济天人，佐国为时，立功及物，每以主会之日言功举迁，永誓遵修，不负效信，伏惟 三天大圣太上众尊，省览臣诚，常加恩宥，臣某诚惶诚恐，稽首顿首，谨启。 次出官 谨出臣某身中上仙上灵北一太上一将军，太上十将军，上仙百五十将军，直使功曹，正一功曹，治病功曹，各十五人，出主为臣执使主将，司察东西南北，正定诸炁，消除百病； 上仙上灵左右官使者，主将送东西南北，辟斥三灾九厄，五刑六害之考； 都主吏兵主领左右，无令前后错互； 上仙灵阴阳神决吏各十五人出，为臣和正阴阳，决定生籍，安神养性，使合真仙； 上仙上灵阴阳治病功曹，阴阳治病天医吏，各十五人，出主为臣调理阴阳，察侯五藏神仙妙药，却病消灾； 上仙上灵二官百五十将军，主领官将吏兵士卒，围绕臣身周匝三重，无令空缺； 上仙上灵郎吏、虎贲察奸钩骑，三官仆射吏，各千二百人出，主为臣屯守所居，营卫左右，随逐东西南北，去身百步兵刃，外向讨捕凶逆，执捉奸邪，并令绝灭，不得纵逸，常当保护臣身； 上仙上灵天驺甲卒各千二百人出，天丁力士各百二十人出，主为臣随遂东西南北，所有呼召应声而集； 上仙上灵收炁食炁吏，收神食神吏，收鬼食鬼吏，收邪食邪吏，收毒食毒吏，各六十人出，主为臣收食天下毒疫鬼炁，妖精邪神，伤寒疟疠，毒疰瘟邪，虫兽强（歹＋羊），皆收而食之，悉令荡散；

Reverently emerge the **Heavenly Illustrious Red Officials, Direct-Affairs Merit-Recorders**, the **Spirit-Registers Spirit-Capital Protectors, Prison-Capturing Great Clerks**, the **Evil-Capturing Envoys**, and the **Spirit-Direct-Tally Evil-Slaying Treachery-Stabbing Clerks**, each numbering two, along with one hundred twenty **Immortal Persons, Daoist Masters, and Jade Maidens**, the **Seven Body-Guarding Spirits**, fourteen **Unseparating-Body Generals and Clerks**, two **Illness-Treating Merit-Recorders and Body-Guarding Generals**, nine **Military-Affairs Clerks**, two **Bian Que Clerks and Heavenly Physicians**, all to execute authority, slay evil and destroy falsehood, repel death and invite life, assisting your servant’s body, ensuring responsive breath. Your servant, a humble reed of lowly quality, has fortunately encountered this millennial opportunity, prostrating to receive the precious register bestowed by the revered master, restraining the heart and cultivating the body to guard against excess—such grace is boundless.

Your servant, having received the registers of the Upper Immortals and Supreme Spirits, along with their subordinate generals, merit-recorders, envoys, true officials, lords, generals, jade lads, jade maidens, soldiers, clerks, and troops, beseeches them to act according to their respective duties, transmit commands and convey truth, propagate the essentials of the Dao, establish merit to aid the state, practice transformation to save people, instruct the deluded and ignorant, and encourage the good and virtuous. From year’s end to year’s end, from month’s end to month’s end, from day’s end to day’s end, from hour’s end to hour’s end, cycling without cease, may they act in accordance with the method, defending and protecting your servant’s body, delivering from calamities and hardships, ensuring longevity and enduring vision, with the heart-spirit settled and stable. Beneath the covering of august heaven, upon the bearing of august earth, within the illumination of sun and moon, through the passage of mountains and rivers, may the hundred evils be subdued, the myriad spirits obey, the hundred passages flow with moisture, the five viscera generate fluids, true qi descend upon the body, refining form and transforming substance. When merit is accomplished and virtue complete, may your servant ascend to heaven in broad daylight, timely reporting merits without betraying trust.

Your servant, a late and shallow learner, further burdened by foolishness and dimness, having perused the generals, clerks, soldiers, officials, generals, and troops, fears they may not conform to ritual propriety or align in proper order, accumulating a thousand transgressions and ten thousand errors. Humbly beseeches pardon and forgiveness, extending to those yet to awaken, that no punishment be meted. Your servant, with utmost reverence and trepidation, bows twice in prostration.

Bow three times.

The rite of the Orthodox Unity register-perusal is now complete.
